description.en:
The eXPerience Chain Project is an open source project aiming at a society that enables people to gain new experiences by connecting people in the real world using cryptocurrency. The cryptocurrency “eXPerience Chain (XPC)” will be the currency to create the foundation for it.

In order for cryptocurrencies to be accepted by society in the future, it will be necessary to create a special user experience and some added value that can only be provided from cryptocurrencies. XPC-Project thinks that it should be fun to use cryptocurrency, and it aims the experience gained by using cryptocurrency to lead people's life long asset.

status_updates.description:
🎉 XPC will be implemented to AvacusPay! 🎉

The Avacus team has officially confirmed that XPC will be implemented to their newest mobile cryptocurrency payment service: AvacusPay.

With AvacusPay, XPC can be used on a mobile device to send & receive payments, and more!


💡 Read more about this fantastic news: https://steemit.com/xpc/@xpchain/coming-soon-xpc-and-avacuspay-android-ios

🎉 XPC Association has been registered in Italy [EU] 🎉

💡  https://twitter.com/XPChain_Global/status/1147213022731087872 💡

The winner of the 13th vote for the new #crypto joins #CoinDeal! 🎉

You can trade eXPerience Chain on the XPC/TUSD market. 

💱 https://frontend.coindeal.com/market/XPC-TUSD/

🎉 eXPerience Chain is proud to be added into added Binance Info cryptocurrency information platform!

💡 For details, please visit the Binance Info XPC page: https://info.binance.com/en/currencies/experience-chain

🎉 To celebrate the XPC launch, we are setting up an Airdrop event with 250,000,000 XPC 🎉

Everyone can participate by completing various tasks, such as following and retweeting on Twitter and visiting the XPC official website to earn an entry. 

There is a limited 80,000 entries available, so the more total entries, the greater amount of an Airdrop each participant will receive! Event Starts at 1/25 0:00 (UTC) ⏰

💡 For details, please visit the Airdrop event page: https://event.xpchain.io/
